attributes.action: Lower car tax on family cars.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am the mother of four boys and need a car with more than five seats to get around. It is not a trend for me but a necessity. I certainly wouldnt be driving a 7 seater from choice. I would like the primeminister to lower car tax for families that have to use these vehicles. Provide proof if necessary that they need them but please do something to help us.
